duties_responsibilities.duty: Function as a leader in all components of Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS) courses.
Prepare and facilitate ACLS classes, including lecture, group control skills, and skills evaluation stations.
Demonstrate and teach the use of ACLS clinical and medical devices and equipment.
Set up educational presentation tools and lead case-based scenarios, case discussion stations, and practice stations.
Ensure class preparation, equipment maintenance, and accurate completion of course paperwork.

education_certification.credential: Education and training in a healthcare related position requiring ACLS provider skills.
